MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of East Dunbar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.31pm to carry out repairs to an underground cable fault in the car park near to Biel Grange and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.23pm on Wednesday 27th January 2021.
